sub_title: Product builder | Growth Product Manager | Product Strategy
summary: Product builder specialized in customer prioritization, PMs team management,  product lifecycle, and partnerships. As a founder of two companies, I have developed an entrepreneurial necessity to deliver value to my stakeholders by researching, analyzing, and implementing sound and measurable solutions. With more than twelve years of experience in product management for retail, health, banking, and transportation industries, I take strategic and extreme ownership to deliver quick wins and keep teams motivated. KPIs tracking, data analysis, and agile principles have helped me to be well informed to make correct decisions and adapt new product features to budget, scope, and timelines.
